sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>In Madrid, a new total_spend column has been added to the LMR, SMR, and PR and a new samp_publisher_result table has been introduced. We will upgrade only the latest product results so that the new License Workbench will work with the customer's latest recon results. Though the License Workbench is available in samp, these new fields and new table have been added in sams like other recon result fields. So the upgrade script will also live in sams.</description> <name>Upgrade Latest Software Product Results </name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[(function() { var script = 'new SamUpgradeProductResults().upgradeLatestProductResults();'; GlideRunScriptJob.scheduleScript(script); }());]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-08-26 00:09:35</sys_created_on> <sys_id>a6bd88db87c06300ede6f64936cb0b05</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>18</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Upgrade Latest Software Product Results </sys_name> <sys_package display_value="">bd1f72f347213110020ba9f8536d43db</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_a6bd88db87c06300ede6f64936cb0b05</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2019-05-02 23:11:57</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
